channel.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
channel.description:
I've been muted twice this week, once with no explaination, this time because I was singing a song. Here is the stuff I said:
Tyyy9 : You know johnny go get his truck Tyyy9 : Jack it up big tires Tyyy9 : Lift kit chrome tips ***** shining like a diamond Tyyy9 : Go and turn your raido Tyyy9 : Make your self at home ************ : Alllllrighty Tyyy9 : Kick back realx you know we just a bunch of hill billys Tyyy9 : Kick back and throw your hands up with me Tyyy9 : Heyyy we might look a little crazy tonight Tyyy9 : Hey baby that's all right Tyyy9 : No back woods roots its just what we do Tyyy9 : Its just what we do Tyyy9 : Little jimmie jackson Tyyy9 : Was jackin up his bronco Tyyy9 : He's gonna lay a little rubble later on at the truck pull Tyyy9 : And his grannys gettin lit, shes headin out to bingo Tyyy9 : And his woman somokin' palmals watchin lara ingles Tyyy9 : We let it rip Tyyy9 : Yeah we got the money let it go Tyyy9 : Yeah we got the gas it's buck wild Tyyy9 : Yeah but thats the way we get down.... Tyyy9 : In a hicktown! Tyyy9 : Just a creepin' Tyyy9 : Head full of fumes run from your past Tyyy9 : Hide another bear Tyyy9 : What dreams forget the whiskey remembers Tyyy9 : Kinda like ol darlin in a mystery glass just a creepin Tyyy9 : Creepinn Tyyy9 : Oh just a creepin Tyyy9 : I'm just a country boy, with a big ol truck Tyyy9 : The only way i ride, I keep it jacked up Tyyy9 : I got some big tires Tyyy9 : They make some big ruts Tyyy9 : And every time I drive ************ : :P Tyyy9 : Yeah I be kickin up mud Tyyy9 : I got some real trea ************ : Nice! Tyyy9 : Across the leather seats Tyyy9 : I go 2 12's in the back bumpin comin down the street Tyyy9 : I'm crackin johnny cash Tyyy9 : I'm talkin men in blacik ************ : I'm a dragon on a volcano ************ : Roaaarrrr Tyyy9 : If yall don't like it than yall can kiss my country ass Tyyy9 : .30-.06 on my back gun rack Tyyy9 : See a white tail buck put him on his back Tyyy9 : 7mm or 12 guage shotty Tyyy9 : We ain't trying to get drunk and hurt nobody Tyyy9 : Hey lawday-lawd you got a **** body Tyyy9 : Why don't you get muddy and shake that body Tyyy9 : Slap get drunk ************ : Knock it off Tyyy9 : Dirty dancin kickin up mud Tyyy9 : Big truck Tyyy9 : Big tires Tyyy9 : Slinging mud Tyyy9 : To the sky Tyyy9 : Living low ************ : Be nice. Tyyy9 : Riding high Tyyy9 : Kickin' up mud in four wheel drive Tyyy9 : Cut me loose let me go ************ : Guy or not, it doesn't matter. Tyyy9 : I gotta go find that mud hole ************ : I for one believe you're a girl Tyyy9 : Feels so sweet Tyyy9 : I just creep Tyyy9 : Call it my riverrado ************ : Haha Tyyy9 : Bring you rope bring your chain Tyyy9 : Get wyled up when it starts to rain Tyyy9 : Like oh god look at that truck, bet you a bill that it won't get stuck Tyyy9 : Pulled up slow, pulled up nice Tyyy9 : Mickey thomphson 45's Tyyy9 : Pretty little girl with some tanned up thighs Tyyy9 : Askin me if she can ride Tyyy9 : Okay im done Tyyy9 : You guys don't even talk to me
Like really, you have your choice of a censor, com'on guys. This concludes my rant.

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Right, there isn’t bad use of profanity or anything. You think they’re becoming worse, but it is only because of your view on the subject that makes you think that. All they are doing is protecting their player base, which are teenagers, who supposedly shouldn’t know what a curse is.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

lol i clearly dont see anything wrong here…
year by year RS is becoming worse & worse…
sad to see it all go to waste , i remember RS back in 06’ 07’ 08’ 09’ best time then crashed anyways tbh i dont see anything wrong lol, maybe just bit of spamming but nothin to be muted for…

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?

item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Maybe they couldn’t stand your lack of proper spelling.

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Teem_Rocket:

Anyone who types lyrics in-game should be perma-muted.

At one moment when I was getting my fire cape I wrote a song in chat too.
They’re gonna ban me because I annoyed Jad?
It’s ridiculous.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

[quote=“Lil_Smok3r, post:32, topic:514510”][quote author=Teem_Rocket link=topic=632758.msg4283702#msg4283702 date=1366065395]
Why did that receive negative comments? It was a joke.
[/quote]
Team_Rocket wannabe? Bad idea…
OT: I said “fk you ahol*!” and i got permenantly banned.
It was the account which i had gotten the highest level i’ve ever gotten.
[size=1pt]Lvl 79 :fp:, i don’t play that much[/size][/quote]
I can assure you that this is the real Team_Rocket, and not a fanboy want-to-be. Unfortunately, I can provide nothing but my word to prove that to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:27, topic:514510”]The problem with Jagex is they have horrible customer service which provides for silly things like bans over something you weren’t responsible for. If they upgraded that, then there wouldn’t be as many problems like this.

Considering they allow you to either filter your chat or not, you should not be muted or banned for profanity. If this has to do with the fact that you were spamming, then this would also be an incorrect punishment. As you weren’t sending the same message to a majority of people, you were typing lyrics and it was spaced out then it cannot be classed as spam.[/quote]
Thank you. You need to go work in their office lol.

[quote=“Teem_Rocket, post:28, topic:514510”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=632758.msg4283642#msg4283642 date=1366062060]
The problem with Jagex is they have horrible customer service which provides for silly things like bans over something you weren’t responsible for. If they upgraded that, then there wouldn’t be as many problems like this.

Considering they allow you to either filter your chat or not, you should not be muted or banned for profanity. If this has to do with the fact that you were spamming, then this would also be an incorrect punishment. As you weren’t sending the same message to a majority of people, you were typing lyrics and it was spaced out then it cannot be classed as spam.
[/quote]

I’ve seen their Customer Service department. It’s 3 people in one square room with empty bottles of hard liquor scattered about the room.[/quote]
I’m assuming Notch is your Uncle as well?

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

The problem with Jagex is they have horrible customer service which provides for silly things like bans over something you weren’t responsible for. If they upgraded that, then there wouldn’t be as many problems like this.

Considering they allow you to either filter your chat or not, you should not be muted or banned for profanity. If this has to do with the fact that you were spamming, then this would also be an incorrect punishment. As you weren’t sending the same message to a majority of people, you were typing lyrics and it was spaced out then it cannot be classed as spam.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:20, topic:514510”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=632758.msg4282461#msg4282461 date=1365883604]
My account was permanetly banned on April 2nd for goldfarming. It wasn’t even me though. I didn’t have a computer for a few months, until a couple days ago. Plus it was my first offense, so a permanent ban seems a little bit extreme, but oh well. I was really bored with the game anyway, and even when I had a working computer, I was rarely playing it.
[/quote]

I was banned on April 4th for goldfarming, even though I don’t use bots. Sure I had been playing a lot, but I actively talk while I skill, and the appeal still hasn’t gone through. It’s loveing stupid.[/quote]
My brother too was banned for gold farming just a bit earlier than those dates, he was innocent but the ban still wasn’t lifted. Fucking Fagex

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

vManlyMan:

My account was permanetly banned on April 2nd for goldfarming. It wasn’t even me though. I didn’t have a computer for a few months, until a couple days ago. Plus it was my first offense, so a permanent ban seems a little bit extreme, but oh well. I was really bored with the game anyway, and even when I had a working computer, I was rarely playing it.

I was banned on April 4th for goldfarming, even though I don’t use bots. Sure I had been playing a lot, but I actively talk while I skill, and the appeal still hasn’t gone through. It’s fucking stupid.

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

The mutes systems pretty bad.

Date Offence Status Evidence 01-Sep-2012 Offensive/Inappropriate Language Minor (mute) Appeal Pending View 21-Jul-2012 Offensive/Inappropriate Language Major (mute) Appeal Pending View

Not even offensive btw^

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @kinky_whip kinky whip
item.description:
@kinky_whip wrote:

Lin:

I do believe it’s their moderators that are by default in charge of infractions. I may be wrong.

Their moderators have the option to Mute for 24-48 Hours, however their reports are then looked over by a CM to make sure it’s not abuse (after the mute has taken place).

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:15, topic:514510”]They didn’t, it’s just immature player mods who get mute happy.[/quote]He was mocking you for saying “listen to” regarding in-game messages.

Read full topic

item.title: Jagex Over Sensitive?
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

tyb97:

I didn’t know Jagex has equipped the game with text to speech for chat.

They didn’t, it’s just immature player mods who get mute happy.

Cruel Truth:

but no seriously it is just plainly spamming when you do it constantly. And as a person who bank stands to skill it can be an irritated thing to have to listen to as well.

They have a function to get rid of that. They can either turn off or mute their public chat or just add them to their ignore list. I would not count music lyrics as spam.

Read full topic
